name: akWPLightbox
author: Amit kumar singh

sections.description:
Aim of this plugin was to create a simple lightbox, to be used with the images on the post, it helps you add your images as you do now, it will take care of rest of the things. It works transparently without adding any extra work on your part.

For more information check out the plugin homepage.

Tip: To keep track of this plugin’s evolution and features, you are advised to subscribe to the author’s feed
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload akwpLightbox to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it nothing else.
  4. Now it will automatically find the images in the post and show it with lightbox effect.
sections.faq:
How to use it?

Simple, just activate the plugin and you are done. just remeber to link the images that you post in blog to the image that you want to see in lightbox.

short_description: It makes all the image in a post that are linked to larger images, to open with lightbox effect.
